AI Description: MPICH is a high-performance and widely portable implementation of the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard. It enables parallel computing on a wide variety of platforms and architectures.
Core Features: Implements The Mpi Standard For Message Passing Interface, High-Performance Parallel Computing Capabilities, Portability Across Diverse Platforms & Architectures, Support For Large-Scale Parallel Applications
General Tags: Mpi Implementation, Parallel Computing, High Performance Computing
